channel.title: Mega.co.nz downloader for those who is having problems to download files UPDATED
channel.description:
Tired of downloading files in www.mega.co.nz and it always give "temporary error retrying" while downloading the file,i got a solution for that error,this download manager can pause,resume interrupted downloads in mega.co.nz :) :eek: :cool:
[b]MEGA DOWNLOADER[/b]
Note: To download the file just copy the link in the url bar and add it in Mega Downloader. To download the file succesfully go to Options then Configuration and select your download path. :)
[b]Changelogs:[/b] [code]Changelogs:
v9 - 22/06/2013 - Fixed error with MegaCrypter. - Improved performance when downloading big files. - Fixed error when MEGA gives a 403 (forbidden) error (it was not treated correctly and caused the program to crash).
v0.8.1 BETA - 24/04/2013 - Fixed error with download list from 0.7.
v0.8 BETA - 18/04/2013 - Support for ELC. - When adding links, the package name is not mandatory anymore; if empty, it takes the name of the first file. - Internal improvements, some minor bugs corrected. - Fixed error with XP SP3 when .NET 3.5 was not installed.
v0.7 BETA - 23/03/2013 - Support for DLC files. - Support for MEGA's shared folders. - Added "Force download" option. - Added support for VLC portable. - Fixed Allocine movie extraction (used in the streaming library). - Improved error handling. [/code]
Download Links:
[url=http://uppit.com/5wnm70rkcuii/MegaDownloader_V0.61.rar]Download MegaDownloader V6[/url]
[url=http://uppit.com/7r82w17b4ezk/Mega_Downloader_V0.7.rar]Download MegaDownloader V7[/url]
[url=http://uppit.com/5mp68o9jue5m/MegaDownloader_V0.8.1.rar]Download MegaDownloader V8[/url]
[url=http://uppit.com/rlhza0ycrpmq/Mega_Downloader_V9.rar]Download MegaDownloader V9[/url]
If you want automatic update it will just prompt you to download the new version of MEGA DOWNLOADER make sure that you open MEGA DOWNLOADER first then you will see a button and click to update. :)
Pics :) To download a file just copy the link in the URL bar like this (this file is only an example and im not downloading illegal files look at the size in the picture after the download is finish) sorry for my bad english
[IMG]http://img805.imageshack.us/img805/2574/71678352.png[/img]
After that you will see this :)
[IMG]http://img248.imageshack.us/img248/4286/26696108.png[/img]
And the download will start automatically! here if the download doesn't start start the download manually :)
[IMG]http://img213.imageshack.us/img213/8461/57797264.png[/img]
If the [b]LINKS[/b] are down pm me!! ;)
I upload it in uppit so i can track the downloads.
Note: MegaDownloader needs .net framework 4 and above in order for it to work
Well 1 thanks and 2500+ downloads in all versions :(
If you have problems pm me! ;)
[b]Please don't forget to say [b]THANKS[/b] if it helped you alot.[/b]
By the way if you want MEGA UPLOADER here's the link make sure that you use MEGA DOWNLOADER to download this file.
[url=https://mega.co.nz/#!PVdlTBBK!zoBeYuX2ZIQoeljeaRFRTKqkrYSyFlpLh8fVMuDVuYg]Download MegaUploader[/url]

@haiimboss wrote:

Tired of downloading files in www.mega.co.nz and it always give “temporary error retrying” while downloading the file,i got a solution for that error,this download manager can pause,resume interrupted downloads in mega.co.nz :eek:

MEGA DOWNLOADER

Note: To download the file just copy the link in the url bar and add it in Mega Downloader. To download the file succesfully go to Options then Configuration and select your download path.

Changelogs:

[code]Changelogs:

v9 - 22/06/2013

  • Fixed error with MegaCrypter.
  • Improved performance when downloading big files.
  • Fixed error when MEGA gives a 403 (forbidden) error (it was not treated correctly and caused the program to crash).

v0.8.1 BETA - 24/04/2013

  • Fixed error with download list from 0.7.

v0.8 BETA - 18/04/2013

  • Support for ELC.
  • When adding links, the package name is not mandatory anymore; if empty, it takes the name of the first file.
  • Internal improvements, some minor bugs corrected.
  • Fixed error with XP SP3 when .NET 3.5 was not installed.

v0.7 BETA - 23/03/2013

  • Support for DLC files.
  • Support for MEGA’s shared folders.
  • Added “Force download” option.
  • Added support for VLC portable.
  • Fixed Allocine movie extraction (used in the streaming library).
  • Improved error handling.
    [/code]
